name: part_006
file: tmp_いつか吾輩もあの頃のインターネットって言われる日が来るのかな #ラプラス・バースデイ2025 [m8hqs4NMij4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: A theatrical 'Gospel Revelation' segment parodying fortune-telling advertisements.

subtitles.original: ほらほら また始まった お得意の自己弁護言い訳
subtitles.english: Look, look, it's starting again—your specialty: self-defense and excuses.

subtitles.original: でもね
subtitles.english: But you see...

subtitles.original: だって
subtitles.english: Because...

subtitles.original: ほらほら また始まった ごめんからのキスのパターンって感じ
subtitles.english: Look, look, it's starting again—the 'sorry, then a kiss' pattern.

subtitles.original: 安易
subtitles.english: So simplistic.

subtitles.original: いつかあたしだけ そんな夢見たこともあったけど
subtitles.english: There was a time when I dreamed of being the only one for you...

subtitles.original: 寂しい時だけ電話して もううんざりだわ
subtitles.english: But you only call when you're lonely. I'm so sick of it.

subtitles.original: 全然あたしに興味ないじゃん 君が好きなのは自分自身でしょ
subtitles.english: You have zero interest in me, do you? The only one you love is yourself.

subtitles.original: YEAH!
subtitles.english: YEAH!

subtitles.original: やっぱりあたしに興味ないじゃん その話もう聞き飽きたわ
subtitles.english: Just as I thought, you don't care about me. I've heard that story enough.

subtitles.original: そもそも大体あたしに興味ないじゃん そうやってまた誤魔化して
subtitles.english: To begin with, you're not interested in me at all. You're just dodging it again.

subtitles.original: Be my boy わがまま過ぎる baby
subtitles.english: Be my boy, you're far too selfish, baby.

subtitles.original: 抱きしめてよ
subtitles.english: Just hold me.

subtitles.original: ほんときにはしょうもないな 甘やかしちゃしょうがないな 泣いたっていかないでっていったってかわらしなよ
subtitles.english: Honestly, it's so hopeless. I can't help spoiling you. Even if I cry or say 'don't go,' just keep being charming.

subtitles.original: もう少しだけなら まぁ踊ってもいいかもな 蕩けて溶けていたいよ
subtitles.english: If it's just for a little longer, I guess I could dance. I want to melt away with you.

subtitles.original: どんなアピールも意味ないし 気付いてくれないけど
subtitles.english: No matter how I try to appeal to you, it's meaningless; you never notice.

subtitles.original: あたしが寂しい時だって 会いに来て
subtitles.english: But even when I'm the one feeling lonely, please come see me.

subtitles.original: 全然あたしに興味ないじゃん どこが駄目なの教えてよ
subtitles.english: You have zero interest in me, do you? Tell me, what's wrong with me?

subtitles.original: やっぱりあたしに興味ないじゃん 携帯ばかりいじってさ
subtitles.english: Just as I thought, you don't care about me. Always messing with your phone.

subtitles.original: そもそも大体あたしに興味ないじゃん 少しぐらい期待させて
subtitles.english: To begin with, you're not interested in me at all. At least give me a little hope.

subtitles.original: Lonely girl 独り占めしてよ baby
subtitles.english: Lonely girl, keep me all to yourself, baby.

subtitles.original: 振り回さないで
subtitles.english: Don't toy with my heart.

subtitles.original: ねぇ maybe melody One, two, shall we dance? 踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Hey, maybe a melody—one, two, shall we dance? Let's dance together.

subtitles.original: 早く手繋いで 最後にとっておきだけ 溺れるくらい愛してよ
subtitles.english: Hurry, take my hand. Just for the very end, love me so much that I feel like I'm drowning.

subtitles.original: 全然あたしに興味ないじゃん 君が好きなのは自分自身でしょ
subtitles.english: You have zero interest in me, do you? The only one you love is yourself.

subtitles.original: やっぱりあたしに興味ないじゃん その話もう聞き飽きたわ
subtitles.english: Just as I thought, you don't care about me. I've heard that story enough.

subtitles.original: そもそも大体あたしに興味ないじゃん そうやってまた誤魔化して
subtitles.english: To begin with, you're not interested in me at all. You're just dodging it again.

subtitles.original: Get down, star 覚悟はできてるの?
subtitles.english: Get down, star. Are you ready for this?

subtitles.original: 気まぐれメルシィ
subtitles.english: Kimagure Mercy

subtitles.original: お代はいかが?
subtitles.english: How's that for the price?

subtitles.original: おまえの苦労はずっと見ていたぞ
subtitles.english: I've been watching your hard work this whole time.

subtitles.original: 本当によく頑張ったな
subtitles.english: You've really done your best.

subtitles.original: ついに我慢が報われ、膨大な富を得る
subtitles.english: Finally, your patience will be rewarded, and you will gain immense wealth.

subtitles.original: このライブを飛ばしてしまえば、これまでの苦労は全て水の泡だ
subtitles.english: If you skip this live stream, all your past efforts will be in vain.

subtitles.original: 世界中がおまえを否定しても、吾輩だけはおまえを認めてやる
subtitles.english: Even if the whole world rejects you, I alone will acknowledge you.

subtitles.original: 散々苦しんだのだ、もう楽になれ
subtitles.english: You've suffered so much; now, find peace.

subtitles.original: 富を望んでいるのなら、やることがある
subtitles.english: If you desire wealth, there is something you must do.

subtitles.original: このライブを最後まで見てチャンネルを登録するんだ
subtitles.english: Watch this live stream until the end and subscribe to the channel.

subtitles.original: やり方は簡単だ、誰にでもできる
subtitles.english: The method is simple; anyone can do it.

subtitles.original: 下の赤いチャンネル登録ボタンを押して高評価ボタンを押すのだ
subtitles.english: Press the red subscribe button below and click the like button.

subtitles.original: これで幸福の精算が始まる
subtitles.english: With this, the tallying of your happiness begins.

subtitles.original: 吾輩は決して無理強いはしない、やるもやらぬもおまえ次第だ
subtitles.english: I will never force you. Whether you do it or not is up to you.

subtitles.original: では締め括りに吾輩の波動を送る 3、2、1...
subtitles.english: Now, to conclude, I shall send you my energy wave. 3, 2, 1...

subtitles.original: 今だ！
subtitles.english: Now!

subtitles.original: おまえのライブ運は上昇している
subtitles.english: Your luck regarding live shows is rising.

subtitles.original: このままライブを見続けるのだ
subtitles.english: Keep watching this live stream.

subtitles.original: 甘い夢見て 心までラ・ラ・プラ・プラ・プラ 餌付けて
subtitles.english: Dreaming sweet dreams, baiting my very heart with La-la-pla-pla-pla.

subtitles.original: ただ深い微睡みの 喉にラ・ラ・プラ・プラ・プラ 混ざり合って
subtitles.english: Blending into a deep slumber, down the throat with La-la-pla-pla-pla.

subtitles.original: ぐるるるる
subtitles.english: Grrr rrrr rr.

subtitles.original: 一つ二つ 宵闇にラ・ラ・プラ・プラ・プラ 蕩けて
subtitles.english: One, two, melting into the twilight with La-la-pla-pla-pla.

subtitles.original: ただ熱いその命さえ ラ・ラ・プラ・プラ・プラ 飲まれてさ
subtitles.english: Even that hot life itself is swallowed up by La-la-pla-pla-pla.

subtitles.original: ぐるるるる
subtitles.english: Grrr rrrr rr.

subtitles.original: 名・UFO・UFO ビ・ア・UFO 前世善の運命委ねて
subtitles.english: Mei-UFO-UFO, be-a-UFO, entrusting the fate of my past life's goodness.

subtitles.original: アイ・UFO・UFO ビ・ア・UFO...
subtitles.english: Ai-UFO-UFO, be-a-UFO...
